ProtectTrackID.PluginDescription: Provides a option to protect idSite using hash instead default numeric
ProtectTrackID.SettingsDescription: Settings for ProtectTrackID. If you are new with this plugin, IS VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to you read documentation in https://github.com/joubertredrat/Matomo-ProtectTrackID before configure.
ProtectTrackID.BaseHelp: Enter a alphanumeric upcase and/or downcase, symbols is not allowed. Example: %1$s
ProtectTrackID.SaltHelp: Enter with a big random string with minimum %1$d characters. Example: %2$s
ProtectTrackID.LengthHelp: Enter a length between %1$d and %2$d. Example: 15
ProtectTrackID.ErrMsgInvalidBase: Invalid value on base, was filled %1$s.
ProtectTrackID.ErrMsgInvalidSalt: Invalid value on salt, was filled %1$s.
ProtectTrackID.ErrMsgInvalidLenght: Invalid value on length, expected between %1$d and %2$d, was filled %3$d.
